name: Radioactive Run
description:
Dodge obstacles and destroy missiles! Try to set a record for how long you can survive. The 3-minute mark is when it starts getting really difficult!

Made for Minijam 76: Radiation, which also happens to be the first game jam I've ever participated in. This is also my first solo project in Unity.

The theme for the jam was Radiation, and the limitation was to make the game playable with one hand.
